regexes.name: sshd
patterns: Timeout before authentication for connection from (.*) to .*, pid = .*

regexes.name: nginx
patterns: FastCGI sent in stderr: "Primary script unknown" while reading response header from upstream, client: (.*), server: .*, request: ".*", host: ".*"
".*" is not found \(2: No such file or directory\), client: (.*), server: .*, request: ".*", host: ".*"
open\(\) ".*" failed \(2: No such file or directory\), client: (.*), server: .*, request: ".*", host: ".*"
directory index of ".*" is forbidden, client: (.*), server: .*, request: ".*", host: ".*"
